articles.title: Exclusive: EU in advanced talks with Johnson & Johnson on COVID-19 vaccine deal - sources - Reuters.com
articles.description: The European Commission is in advanced talks with pharmaceuticals giant Johnson & Johnson to reserve or make an up-front purchase of its COVID-19 vaccine under development, two officials familiar with the talks told Reuters.
